thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Taiwan Leader Biotech sets subscription record date on March 28 for new shares issuance

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Taiwan Leader Biotech sets subscription record date on March 28 for new shares issuance
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Taiwan Leader Biotech Corp :
* Says it plans to issue 4.7 million new shares of the company to raise fund for working capital supplement
* Subscription record date is March 28
* Last date before book closure is March 23
* Book closure period is from March 24 to March 28
* Payment period is from April 4 to May 5
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/yHJCjk
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
